objects.description: [Stuxnet](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0010) renames s7otbxdx.dll, a dll responsible for handling communications with a PLC. It replaces this dll file with its own version that allows it to intercept any calls that are made to access the PLC. (Citation: Nicolas Falliere, Liam O Murchu, Eric Chien February 2011)

external_references.source_name: Nicolas Falliere, Liam O Murchu, Eric Chien February 2011
external_references.description: Nicolas Falliere, Liam O Murchu, Eric Chien 2011, February W32.Stuxnet Dossier (Version 1.4) Retrieved. 2017/09/22
